price: "Afastou-os, para que se não prosternassem diante de Allah, quem faz sair o recôndito nos céus e na terra, e sabe o que escondeis e o que manifestais."
arabic: أَلَّاۤ يَسۡجُدُواْۤ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِي يُخۡرِجُ ٱلۡخَبۡءَ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَيَعۡلَمُ مَا تُخۡفُونَ وَمَا تُعۡلِنُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: allā yasjudū lillahi alladhī yukh'riju al-khaba-a fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wayaʿlamu mā tukh'fūna wamā tuʿ'linūna
